snippet: The cartoonist Daniel Clowes receives his first museum retrospective at the Oakland Museum of California beginning April 14. The show will then go on tour.
abstract: Cartoonist Daniel Clowes, who has his first museum retrospective at the Oakland Museum of California, is one of today's most successful and respected graphic novelists, lauded for his stylistic genius, heartfelt emotion and biting cynicism; though he is highly prolific, he has rarely before now been recognized.
lead_paragraph: The cartoonist Daniel Clowes receives his first museum retrospective at the Oakland Museum of California beginning April 14. The show will then go on tour.

headline.seo: Daniel Clowes’s Retrospective at the Oakland Museum
headline.main: Humanity’s Discomfort, Punctured With a Pen
headline.print_headline: Humanity’s Discomfort, Punctured With a Pen
